AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol: law enforcement agency monitoring traffic on Farm-to-Market Road 2050, familiar with local vehicles and recognizing approximately 90-95% of them as belonging to farmers and oil field workers
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Farm-to-Market Road 2050: road frequently used for drop-offs of illegal aliens to avoid checkpoints and adjacent to the Border Patrol station parking lot
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.black Dodge pickup truck: vehicle involved in a case where it was determined to be driving in tandem with a white Malibu sedan and exited off Highway 59 onto Farm-to-Market Road 2050
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.white Malibu sedan: vehicle involved in a case where it was determined to be driving in tandem with a black Dodge truck and exited off Highway 59 onto Farm-to-Market Road 2050
